fxInfo_clarification: If both chambers must act, then please select ”Both Chambers of the Legislature are required.” If either chamber can act, then please select both the ”First Chamber of the Legislature” and the ”Second Chamber of the Legislature.”
fxInfo_ordering: Asked only if HOGELECT is answered 3, or if HOGELECT is answered 25.
fxInfo_question: Who nominates the Head of Government for Appointment?

fxInfo_responses.value: First (or only) chamber of the Legislature. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_HOGNOM_2]
Both Chambers of the Legislature are required. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_HOGNOM_4]
Other, please specify in the comments section. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_HOGNOM_96]
